nodes.text: Destruction of the Felucia medical station

The Felucia medical station, set up by the Grand Army of the Republic for a place to send its wounded, was destroyed by an attack carried out by two Separatist Munificent-Class Star Frigates and a larger Providence-class carrier/destroyer over the planet Felucia. This then led to Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano being sent to investigate, only to be attacked by enemy Vulture Droids causing them to crash land on the planet below, which resulted in their involvement in the Skirmish on Felucia.
